item.title: 美国可转换债券发行量因市场波动和利率不确定而下滑
item.description: 美国股市 8 月份的狂风暴雨让可转换债券发行商无所适从，这种情况很可能会持续到 9 月份，因为利率的走势仍然悬而未决。【原文：The US stock market’s August whipsaw has convertible bond issuers hiding, and that’s likely to continue into September with the movement of interest rates still up in the air.】

item.title: 匈牙利称莫尔接近达成经乌克兰向俄罗斯供应石油的协议
item.description: 匈牙利称，炼油厂 Mol Nyrt. 正在讨论通过乌克兰从俄罗斯卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）接收原油的变通办法，可能在未来几个月内实施，但预计这将导致运输成本增加。【原文：Hungary said refiner Mol Nyrt. is discussing a workaround to receive crude from Russia’s Lukoil PJSC via Ukraine, possibly in the coming months, though that’s expected to result in increased transport costs.】

item.title: 调查显示尼日利亚企业对奈拉的短期前景持悲观态度
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行的一项调查显示，尼日利亚企业预计从现在到 12 月奈拉会走弱，但明年会升值。【原文：Nigerian businesses expect the naira to weaken between now and December but it will appreciate next year, according to a survey by the central bank.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济放缓幅度略高于预期，原因是利率下行
item.description: 由于近两年两位数的借贷成本拖累了需求，墨西哥第二季度的经济增速与前三个月相比有所放缓。【原文：Mexico’s economy slowed in the second quarter compared to the three months prior, as nearly two years of double-digit borrowing costs weighed on demand.】

item.title: 德国即将达成拯救游轮制造商 Meyer Werft 的协议
item.description: 德国政府正在为陷入财务困境的造船厂 Meyer Werft GmbH 寻求潜在的救命稻草，这家私营企业几天前刚刚赢得了为迪斯尼游轮公司船队供应船只的后续合同。【原文：The German government is working on a potential lifeline for financially stricken shipbuilder Meyer Werft GmbH, the privately-held company that just days ago won a follow-on contract to supply vessels for Disney Cruise Line’s fleet.】

item.title: 宝马首次在欧洲电动汽车销量中超过特斯拉
item.description: 宝马汽车公司上个月在欧盟的电动汽车销量首次超过了特斯拉公司，因为这家德国汽车制造商在电池驱动汽车市场疲软的情况下设法增加了出货量。【原文：BMW AG outsold Tesla Inc. on electric vehicles in the European Union for the first time last month as the German carmaker managed to increase shipments in an otherwise weakening market for battery-powered cars.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员誓言对九月会议保持开放心态
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）上一次政策决定的说明显示，该行官员认为 9 月份是审查其利率立场的适当时机，不过他们承诺，鉴于通胀前景面临的风险依然存在，他们将保持开放的态度。【原文：European Central Bank officials deemed September to be an appropriate point to review their interest-rate stance, though pledged to keep an open mind in light of lingering risks to the inflation outlook, an account of their last policy decision showed.】

item.title: 铁路罢工扰乱通勤秩序，多伦多和蒙特利尔工人陷入困境
item.description: 由于加拿大两家最大的铁路公司发生劳资纠纷，加拿大三个最大城市的数千名乘客正在寻找其他上班方式。【原文：Thousands of commuters in three of Canada’s biggest cities are scouring for alternate ways to work due to a labor dispute involving two of the country’s largest railways.】

item.title: 风电产业尚未走出阴霾
item.description:
最糟糕的时期可能已经过去，但该行业距离全面复苏仍有一段距离。【原文：

The worst may have passed, but the sector is still some way off from a full recovery.

】

item.title: 扎克伯格推销其人工智能愿景，Meta 股价一飞冲天
item.description: 想在人工智能领域大手笔投入并获得投资者青睐的科技巨头，应该借鉴 Meta Platforms 公司的做法。【原文：Technology giants that want to spend big on artificial intelligence and stay in the good graces of investors should take a page out of Meta Platforms Inc.’s playbook.】

item.title: 香奈儿收购瑞士尖端制表商 MB&F 少数股权
item.description: 香奈儿有限公司正在收购瑞士钟表品牌 MB&F 的少数股份，这项交易将为这家独立制表商提供资金保障，同时提升法国时尚品牌在高级钟表业的地位。【原文：Chanel Ltd. is buying a minority stake in Swiss watch brand MB&F in a deal that will give the independent watchmaker financial security while boosting the French fashion brand’s standing in the high horology industry.】

item.title: 从红海受胡塞武装袭击的油轮上撤出船员
item.description: 一艘在红海遭遇数次袭击的船只的船主和管理者说，在海军的支援下，船员已从船上撤离。【原文：The crew of a ship that suffered several attacks in the Red Sea has been evacuated from the vessel with naval support, its owner and manager said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储会议纪要显示，9 月降息是板上钉钉的事，经济数据的发布方式也存在问题。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed minutes suggest a rate cut in September is on the cards and there are questions on how economic data gets released. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 匈牙利考虑将移民送往布鲁塞尔以报复欧盟罚款
item.description: 匈牙利表示，除非它能解决与欧盟在庇护政策处罚问题上的争议，否则它可能会开始将出现在其边境的移民直接运往布鲁塞尔。【原文：Hungary suggested it might start transporting migrants who show up at its border straight to Brussels unless it can resolve a dispute with the European Union on penalties for its asylum policies.】

item.title: 铜价急剧下跌助推全球贸易流动逆转
item.description: 今年 5 月，当铜在纽约飙升至历史新高时，一艘船正在太平洋上将一种未加工的金属从智利运往最大的买家中国。【原文：When copper surged toward a record high in New York in May, a ship was in the Pacific Ocean carrying a raw form of the metal from Chile to top buyer China.】

item.title: 市场回暖提升回报率，中国平安利润上升
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司（以下简称 "平安"）表示，上半年利润增长近 7%，此前股市回暖帮助提高了这家中国市值第二大保险公司的投资回报。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. said profit rose nearly 7% in the first half, after a stock-market recovery helped bolster investment returns at China’s second-largest insurer by market value.】

item.title: 量化紧缩政策首次走向全球，市场面临考验
item.description: 过去二十年来，发达国家的顶级央行屡次驶过未知的水域，如今正进入一个新的阶段：这是它们首次联合实施量化紧缩政策。【原文：After having sailed through uncharted waters repeatedly over the past two decades, the developed world’s top central banks are entering a new stretch: For the first time, they’re engaging in joint quantitative tightening.】

item.title: 沃尔沃卡车获得 DSV 300 辆电池驱动卡车订单
item.description: 物流公司 DSV 计划从沃尔沃公司（Volvo AB）购买 300 辆电动重型卡车，这将是这家瑞典制造商迄今为止最大的电池动力钻机商业订单之一。【原文：Logistics firm DSV plans to buy 300 electric heavy trucks from Volvo AB in what would be one of the largest commercial orders to date for the Swedish manufacturer’s battery-powered rigs.】

item.title: 西班业公司获得 5 亿欧元资金用于完成芬兰锂项目
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd.同意融资 5 亿欧元（5.57 亿美元），以完成芬兰的一个锂项目，进军所谓的绿色金属领域。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. agreed €500 million ($557 million) of financing to complete a Finnish lithium project, as it pushes into so-called green metals.】

item.title: 投资者对分析师的乐观情绪降温，新兴市场股票越来越便宜
item.description: 自 2020 年 3 月科威德-19恐慌以来，新兴市场股票与美国股票的交易折让幅度最大，因为胆怯的投资者正在其他地方寻找增长机会。【原文：Emerging-market stocks are trading at the steepest discount to US equities since the Covid-19 panic in March 2020 as skittish investors look elsewhere for growth opportunities.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 Apex 成立博茨瓦纳首家基金管理公司
item.description: 凯雷投资的金融服务公司 Apex Group 表示，它将于今年在博茨瓦纳设立首个基金管理办事处，并在当地派驻负责人和团队。【原文：Apex Group, the Carlyle-backed financial services firm, said it will set up Botswana’s first fund administration office with a local head and team this year.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的利比亚因加油站干涸而暂停燃料供应
item.description: 本周利比亚发生严重燃料短缺，利比亚总理将国家燃料配送公司负责人停职，这是针对石油官员的一连串解雇和调查中的最新一起。【原文：Libya’s premier suspended the head of the state fuel-distribution company after a severe shortage this week, the latest in a string of firings and probes targeting oil officials.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯石油出口销售额降至三年来最低点
item.description: 由于油价下跌和沙特决定限制产量，沙特阿拉伯的石油出口收入已下滑到三年来的最低水平。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s revenue from oil exports has slumped to the lowest level in three years, caused by a drop in oil prices and the kingdom’s decision to curb production.】

item.title: 总部设在伦敦的船舶注册处帮助俄罗斯油轮继续运营
item.description: 三艘因运输俄罗斯石油而受到英国制裁的油轮正悬挂着一个以伦敦为基地的国家的国旗航行。【原文：Three oil tankers that are under British sanctions for transporting Russian petroleum are sailing under the flag of a nation that bases its operations in London.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长放缓，支持欧洲央行再次降息
item.description: 衡量欧元区工资水平的一个重要指标有所放缓；这进一步支持了欧洲中央银行下月继续降低利率。【原文：A key gauge of euro-zone wages eased — reinforcing the case for the European Central Bank to continue lowering interest rates next month.】

item.title: 由 CPPIB 支持的 Multiples 为继续基金寻求 3 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度私募股权公司 Multiples Alternative Asset Management Pvt 正在寻求一笔超过 3 亿美元的二级交易，以使该公司有更多的时间和资金来持有至少两项资产。【原文：Indian private equity firm Multiples Alternative Asset Management Pvt is seeking more than $300 million in a secondary deal to give the firm more time and money to hold on to at least two of its assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 肯尼亚国家中央银行将加纳数字银行启动时间推迟至 2025 年
item.description: NCBA集团首席执行官约翰-加乔拉（John Gachora）表示，NCBA集团将把在加纳推出数字银行服务的计划推迟到2025年，因为西非国家的监管机构改变了一些规则，并要求该银行重新提出申请。【原文：NCBA Group is postponing plans to roll out digital-banking services in Ghana to 2025 after regulators in the West African nation changed some rules and asked the lender to reapply, Group Chief Executive Officer John Gachora said.】

item.title: 银行将风险从资产负债表上移除的最热门方法
item.description:
追踪合成风险转移的发展。【原文：

Tracing the development of synthetic risk transfers.

】

item.title: 巴黎奥运意外提振欧元区经济
item.description: 巴黎奥运会出人意料地推动了欧元区经济的增长，使私营部门的增长速度达到三个月来的最快水平。【原文：The euro-area economy got an unexpectedly strong boost from the Paris Olympics, which propelled private-sector growth to the fastest pace in three months.】

item.title: 亿万富翁阿达尼将整顿家族办公室，聘请审计师和首席执行官加强监督
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）计划任命一家全球顶级公司的审计师，并为其家族办公室聘请一名首席执行官，以实现通常与上市公司相关的信息披露水平。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani plans to appoint auditors from a top global firm and hire a chief executive officer for his family offices to bring a level of disclosure often associated with listed companies, people familiar with the matter said.】
